sense.def:
Kar je
sour
, ima močen okus, podoben okusu limone ali nezrelega jabolka.

seg.quote: Add enough sugar to keep it from tasting sour.

sense.def:
Mleko, ki je
sour
, ima neprijeten okus, ker ni več sveže.

Ljudje, ki so
sour
, so slabe volje in neprijazni.

seg.quote: I received a sour look every time I passed her house.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
goes sour
ali
turns sour
, postane manj prijetno ali manj zadovoljivo.

Kadar prijateljstvo ali stališče do nečesa
sours
ali kadar nekaj
sours a friendship or attitude
, postane manj prijateljsko ali optimistično.

seg.quote: These latest cuts might sour relations between the government and the military.
